title: The Chapter of Enlightenment
description: The Chapter of enlightenment is the third book in the motivational series 'Moving on from what's been holding you back in life.' This book ties in all of Kerry's words of wisdom together and adds a spiritual segment that will help you understand yourself on a more personal level, enabling you to unleash the power of your inner confidence and esteem. His encouragement will fuel the passion inside of you. It will force you to embrace the good qualities of life and accept life for what it is. Those who have given up on happiness will be energized to make a bigger commitment to themselves. The techniques he will teach you within these pages will show you that anything is possible. This book is for those who are looking for a more meaningful life.
author: Kerry Girling
